Text: Hi...Had to register to post this comment. All i can say is WOW! And dont stop your torrent is the best things that has happen to me in all my years of torrenting. Great Job Keep it coming and pleas Dont stop. you are appreciated

Thank you kindly. Not only for the effort of registering to voice your thoughts, but also for the kinds words themselves. They're very much appreciated. :)

Unlike some other membership-based torrent trackers I'm on, I haven't been getting a whole lot of feedback here about these torrents on The Pirate Bay. So I was left wondering if I was sinking effort into something I shouldn't be. I mean, sure I can see that they've been downloaded a few times. And perhaps that can speak to their ultimate value, otherwise nobody would be downloading them, right? But it's nice to hear from Christians such as yourself. Telling me that my efforts are indeed pointed in the right direction.

God Bless! :)
I surely do appreciate it!!!! God Bless you for your hard work!!!!!
